title: Ippanjin Enpou Yori Kaeru. Mata Hatara Kaneba! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: Yuhiro   勇寛
description:
Returned. 

I came back. 

But, food and water and a home, everything needed to live needs money. Even if you just want to live a normal life. And I don't have any money..
If that's the case, I gotta work hard at a part-time job again, like before! 

A normal person that returned from another world does a part-time job, eats food, sometimes runs into trouble, has close calls with the police, and ends up helping some people...Is what was supposed to have happened. 

A written record of a normal life that begins to deviate little by little, a person who himself wants to spend it leisurely in a normal manner, and the surroundings that inevitably start moving in a changing world.>
